author: rjollos
msg: 0.8dev: Removed //Trac// and //setuptools// from package installation requirements.
//Trac// should not be specified as an installation requirement. It causes problems when running `pip install -U`. See also discussion in th:#9800.

author: svn-role
msg: Fix libmagic detection with custom LDFLAGS.
Fixes libmagic detection where configure relies on LDFLAGS
to find libraries in non-standard locations.
This should allow the bb-openbsd buildbot to compile 1.8.x.

author: svn-role
msg: Update copyright years in NOTICE and subversion/libsvn_subr/version.c.

author: svn-role
msg: Remove the '1.8.x-r1581305' branch, merged in r1582588.
